data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Strange Supernaturals Vol 1 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
Strange Supernaturals Vol. 1


Reframe your game with Monster Grin's 99 unique new tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses - whatever works.

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what’s what and who’s who and keep your game rockin'!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, full body, and silver):

  • Akanthas
  • Black Dog
  • Chabouk
  • Curtain Walker
  • Drouk
  • Grinch
  • Puk Wudgie
  • Souk
  • Tsen
  • Wasted Black Dog
  • White Dog

Conversion by: James Holloway

Released on April 04, 2018. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.4 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
